Breath of the Dragon Soul.name: Breath of the Dragon Soul
Breath of the Dragon Soul.fullText:
Dragonsoul Heir Attack 11Breath of the Dragon Soul

You exhale a mighty blast of elemental essence.

Encounter        Arcane, Implement ; Varies
Standard Action      Close blast 5

Target: Each creature in the blast

Attack: Charisma vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage. The damage is the type you resist with your Dragon Soul class feature.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 150.
Breath of the Dragon Soul.flavor: You exhale a mighty blast of elemental essence.
Breath of the Dragon Soul.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage. The damage is the type you resist with your Dragon Soul class feature.

Dragon's Revenge.name: Dragon's Revenge
Dragon's Revenge.fullText:
Dragonsoul Heir Utility 12Dragon's Revenge

Elemental power surrounds you and lashes out at those who attack you.

Daily        Arcane ; Varies
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, when any enemy hits or misses you with an attack against AC, that enemy takes 1d10 + your Strength modifier damage. The damage is the type you resist with your Dragon Soul class feature.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 150.
Dragon's Revenge.flavor: Elemental power surrounds you and lashes out at those who attack you.
Dragon's Revenge.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when any enemy hits or misses you with an attack against AC, that enemy takes 1d10 + your Strength modifier damage. The damage is the type you resist with your Dragon Soul class feature.

Veil of the Dragon.name: Veil of the Dragon
Veil of the Dragon.fullText:
Dragonsoul Heir Attack 20Veil of the Dragon

Elemental forces in the form of a dragon hover around you as you slash your foes with claws of magic.

Daily        Arcane, Implement ; Varies
Standard Action      Close burst 3

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Charisma vs. Reflex

Hit: 6d6 + Charisma modifier damage.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, any creature that makes a melee attack against you takes 2d6 + your Charisma modifier damage. In addition, you can use the Veil of the Dragon Attack power, which can be used as a melee basic attack.

Sustain Minor: The effect persists.

Special: The damage dealt by this power is the type you resist with your Dragon Soul class feature.


Veil of the Dragon Attack

Elemental forces in the form of a dragon hover around you as you slash your foes with claws of magic.

Encounter      Arcane, Implement, Varies
Standard Action      Melee 1

Requirement: The Veil of the Dragon power must be active to use this power.

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier damage.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 150.
Veil of the Dragon.flavor: Elemental forces in the form of a dragon hover around you as you slash your foes with claws of magic.
Veil of the Dragon.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any creature that makes a melee attack against you takes 2d6 + your Charisma modifier damage. In addition, you can use the Veil of the Dragon Attack power, which can be used as a melee basic attack.
Veil of the Dragon.special: The damage dealt by this power is the type you resist with your Dragon Soul class feature.
Veil of the Dragon.requirement: The Veil of the Dragon power must be active to use this power.
